SELECT menu_nm, DATE(click_date) AS date, SUM(click_cnt) AS click_cnt FROM menu_click WHERE click_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) GROUP BY menu_nm, date ORDER BY date DESC, CASE menu_nm WHEN 'all_account' THEN 1 WHEN 'inout' THEN 2 WHEN 'inout_report' THEN 3 WHEN 'daily_report' THEN 4 WHEN 'dashboard' THEN 5 ELSE 6 END;

SELECT menu_nm, STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YEARWEEK(click_date, 1), ' Monday'), '%X%V %W') AS date, SUM(click_cnt) AS click_cnt FROM menu_click WHERE click_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 WEEK) GROUP BY menu_nm, STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YEARWEEK(click_date, 1), ' Monday'), '%X%V %W') HAVING date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date DESC, CASE menu_nm WHEN 'all_account' THEN 1 WHEN 'inout' THEN 2 WHEN 'inout_report' THEN 3 WHEN 'daily_report' THEN 4 WHEN 'dashboard' THEN 5 ELSE 6 END;

SELECT menu_nm, DATE_FORMAT(click_date, '%Y-%m') AS date, SUM(click_cnt) AS click_cnt FROM menu_click WHERE click_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 MONTH) GROUP BY menu_nm, DATE_FORMAT(click_date, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY date DESC, CASE menu_nm WHEN 'all_account' THEN 1 WHEN 'inout' THEN 2 WHEN 'inout_report' THEN 3 WHEN 'daily_report' THEN 4 WHEN 'dashboard' THEN 5 ELSE 6 END;
